ball.asksomething: {CROSS} **You need to ask a yes/no question!**
customresponses: {CROSS} **Custom responses are enabled but none were added!**
customresponsesadmin: {CROSS}**Custom responses are enabled but none were added!**
To add new responses use `{PREFIX}settings 8ball setreplies Reply 1|Reply 2|Reply 3`
{WARNING} You need to add at least 2 replies.
ball.question: Question

all: Ahhh, you're one of those people
And pigs fly- oh wait, I thought we were only talking about things that are possible
Are you okay? Normal people don't ask that
As soon as you get your grades up
As soon as your headass learns how to read
Ask me again I'm not sure
Ask your parents for permission first
Bruh what the fuck- just no
Call your grandma you dumb fuck
Call the police when you realize how dumb you are
Fuck you. I'm done with your shit
I'd rather keep that to myself...
I'd rather you ask yourself first
If only it was that easy...
If you give me ice cream I'll answer
If you think about it, yes
Jesus you're killing me with these questions
My friend, it isn't that easy
Not until you get into college
Of all people, why ask me? (jk keep talking to me)
Of course you're gonna ask me that
Oh wouldn't you just love to know the answer
Only a dick like you would know
That's what the goverment want's you to think... :wink:
What are you asking me for?
What the fuck is that supposed to mean?
Yea totally- no of course not you fucker
Yes! Yes! Why won't you take yes for an answer?

donate.title: Magic8 Donation Page
description: Donating to developers are motives for them to keep their projects going and let them know people care about their work.

**Magic8** will for sure be around for a long time, but all the work put in to Magic8 depends on how much the users use it. Donating allows developers to know there are still people who want this project to be under development
Join our server **[Magic8 Support Server]({INVITATION})** for more details about how to obtain `Supporter 💸` role.

invite.title: Invite Magic8 to your server!
description: Hey {AUTHOR}! Do you like **Magic8**?`,`Do you want your friends to know about **Magic8** too?
Invite the bot to your **game server** so all your friends can enjoy **Magic8's** unique features together!

level.title: {BOTNAME} - Server Level
description: **Servers Levels** are made to adjust to members necessity based on **guild size**!
The **more members** you have, the **more custom responses** you can use!
This server can set up to **{MAXRESPONSES}** custom responses.
{CROSS} **Someone stole all nekos. Try again later!**

vote.title: {USER}, considering supporting Magic8?
canvote: {INFO} You can vote once every **12** hours!
cannotvote: {CROSS} **You already voted in the past 12 hours!**
By voting for Magic8, you support developers to keep adding new features and system. It lets them know you are interested in our work!
You can vote by clicking this [link]({VOTELINK}).
{INFO} You can vote once every **12** hours!

description: Need help using akinator? Don't worry, here you have!

`{PREFIX}akinator setchannel` - Restric akinator to a channel.

akinator.youalreadyplaying: {CROSS} **Looks like you are already playing somewhere else!**

description: Need help using ticket system? Don't worry, here you have!
{WARNING} This system is **under development**, expect **bugs** and **errors**.
**Help us** reporting **bugs**/**errors** in our [GitHub]({GITHUBLINK}) or [Support server]({INVITATION})
Need help using ticket system? Don't worry, here you have!
`{PREFIX}ticket setmaxtickets` - Set max number of tickets...
`{PREFIX}ticket setchannel` - Restrict tickets to a channel.
`{PREFIX}ticket setmessage` - Select message for new tickets.
{WARNING} This system is **under development**, expect **bugs** and **errors**.
**Help us** reporting **bugs**/**errors** in our [GitHub]({GITHUBLINK}) or [Support server]({INVITATION})

ticket.disabled: {CROSS} **Ticket system is disabled!** Use `{PREFIX}ticket toggle` to enable it!

error: {CROSS} **Enter a valid amount of max tickets.**
errorbounds: {CROSS} **Tickets amount can't be lower than 0 or greater than 20.**

notsetup: {CROSS} **Tickets are not setup correctly. Contact an administrator!**
errorcreating: {CROSS} **Error creating your ticket. Contact an administrator!**
maxtickets:
{CROSS} **You cannot have more than {AMOUNT} tickets.
Please close them before opening a new one!**

alreadyclosing: {CROSS} **This ticket is already being closed by {USER} ({ID})**
We are creating the transcription of the ticket. Please be patient!
{INFO} This can take up to 10 seconds!

selected: {CHECK} **You selected {CHANNEL} as ticket log channel!**
Type the following command to **remove restriction**. `{PREFIX}ticket setlogchannel clear`
cleared: Type the following command in a prefered channel to **restrict** tickets to that channel. `{PREFIX}ticket setchannel`

selected: {CHECK} **You restricted tickets to {CHANNEL} channel!**
Type the following command to **remove restriction**. `{PREFIX}ticket setchannel clear`
{INFO} `{PREFIX}ticket` will only be available in that channel for members without `ADMINISTRATOR`.
cleared: Type the following command in a prefered channel to **restrict** tickets to that channel. `{PREFIX}ticket setchannel`
{INFO} `{PREFIX}ticket` will only be available in that channel for members without `ADMINISTRATOR`.

selected: {CHECK} **You selected `{CHANNEL}` as ticket category!**
**Magic8** will now create tickets in that category!

{INFO} Make sure **Magic8** has following permissions: `MANAGE_CHANNELS`,`ADD_REACTIONS`,`VIEW_CHANNEL`,`SEND_MESSAGES`,`MANAGE_MESSAGES`,`EMBED_LINKS`,`READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY` and `USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS`.

enabled: {INFO} Make sure you run the command `{PREFIX}ticket setup` to **finish** ticket system **installation** process and check progress!
disabled: {INFO} Use the command again to **enable it**. Make sure you run the command `{PREFIX}ticket setup` to **finish** ticket system **installation** process and check progress!

invalid: {CROSS} **Argument provided is not a valid role ID.**
selected: {CHECK} **You selected {SUPPORTROLE} as Support role!**

Link to ticket messsage: [Click here]({MESSAGELINK})
{INFO} This message will be the one the members must react to open tickets!

reaction - Use reaction to open ticket.

setup.enabled: {CHECK} **All correct. Ticket system is being enabled!**
description: I will help you to **enable** system in your server.
5) Select max ticket amount with `{PREFIX}tickets setmaxtickets [amount]`
6) Select ticket reaction message ID with `{PREFIX}tickets setmessageid [ID]`
{SUPPORTROLESTATUS} Select a role for tickets support.
{MESSAGESTATUS} Select the message for new tickets.
{REACTIONMESSAGESTATUS} Select the message ID for tickets.
